question: Whether the incorporation of the organic matter into the soil would:

answer-i18n.answers:
V Suurendab mullaviljakust
X Suurendab mullaerosiooni
V Parandab mulla veemahutavust
X Suurendab mulla lasuvustihedust

explanation-i18n.explanation:
Orgaanilise aine muldaviimine suurendab mullaviljakust:

* Paraneb mulla filtreerimis- ja puhverdusvõime
* Poorsus suureneb
* Veemahutavus suureneb (orgaanilise aine vee sidumisvõime on tunduvalt suurem, kui mulla mineraalosal)

answers:
V Increases the soil fertility
X Increases soil erosion
V Increases the soil water capacity
X Increases the bulk density of soil
title: 302 Categorie 3
explanation:
Incorporation of soil organics:

* improves the filtration and buffering capacity of soil,
* increases the porosity
* increases the soil water capacity, since the water capacity of organic matter is better than that of mineral particles of the soil.
